peopleAlsoAsk.question: Are online antique appraisals legitimate?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Online valuations. Several websites offer estimates by professional appraisers and other experts in areas as diverse as antique furniture, political memorabilia, and Barbie dolls. You upload photos of your items and provide descriptions; the sites send back valuations, not authentications, usually within a week.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Antique Appraisals, How to Find an Appraiser - Consumer Reports

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to get antiques valued online?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
1. WorthPoint known for its massive pricing database, perfect for appraising antiques, collectibles, and vintage items. You can dig into past auction prices and market trends, which gives you a DIY approach to appraisals.
2. Mearto offers fast, expert appraisals from certified appraisers worldwide.
3. WhatsItWorth.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Do you know a website that evaluate antiques online by picture and description? - Quora

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the best way to get antiques appraised?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: - Professional Appraisers: Look for certified appraisers who specialize in antiques or ceramics. Organizations like the American Society of Appraisers (ASA) or the International Society of Appraisers (ISA) can help you find qualified professionals. - Auction Houses: Many auction houses offer appraisal services.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is there an app to identify and value antiques?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Whether you're a collector, a bargain hunter, or just curious about your attic finds, Antique Identifier by Picture is the perfect companion for your antique explorations.
